name: The Dove
description:
This prototype is only for education only. Developed by Unity. 

2D Side-scrolling adventure game with the pixel art style. Story of the group seeking peace called “The Dove” but somehow the ending of this group has come too early.

How to Play

Movement 

  • Walk -> A D or Arrow Left-Right
  • Space Bar - >Jump
  • Shift -> Run
  • Charge and Release Attack - E
  • Change Attack Angle - W and S
